news.title: Behind the wave of white-collar layoffs: Old-school cost cutting, tariffs and, yes, AI
news.summary: Amazon, Target and UPS are laying off thousands of employees. The reasons behind the cuts go a lot deeper than AI. The cuts are part of a larger plan to cut costs across the industry.

news.title: Yum Brands to review strategic options for Pizza Hut, opening the door to a sale
news.summary: Yum Brands will explore strategic options for Pizza Hut. Pizza Hut has struggled in recent years. Yum Brands is owned by Yum, which also owns KFC and Taco Bell.

news.title: Uber falls 4% despite third-quarter revenue beat
news.summary: The company saw one of its strongest trip volume increases in history. CEO Dara Khosrowshahi said the company saw a strong increase in business.

news.title: Norway's mega wealth fund to reject Elon Musk's $1 trillion Tesla pay package
news.summary: Managers of the world’s largest sovereign wealth fund said they are ‘concerned’ about the proposed deal. The fund is the world's largest, with more than $1 trillion in assets.

news.title: Pfizer tops estimates, raises profit guidance even as sales fall
news.summary: Pfizer hiked its full-year profit guidance, citing its strong business performance and cost cuts. Pfizer sales for the period fell.

news.title: Here’s what America can learn from Germany, Japan and Sweden about how to save Social Security
news.summary: The 2026 Social Security COLA increase of 2.8% won’t be enough to keep up with the current inflation rate.

news.title: Quality of life, even more than affordability, elevates this city to the best place to retire
news.summary: The Midwest nabs the top spot for retirees, but Florida and Texas still prove popular. The top state for retirees is Illinois, followed by Florida and then Texas.

news.title: Uber’s upbeat earnings may not be enough to carry the stock to fresh highs
news.summary: The ride-hailing company plans to be live in at least 10 markets with its autonomous-vehicle fleet by the end of 2026.

news.title: Denny’s stock heads for its biggest gain in decades after the best of multiple buyout bids is accepted
news.summary: Denny's received multiple offers, according to CEO Kelli Valade. Denny’s received several offers for the chain, Valade said.

news.title: My girlfriend, a widow in her 40s, pays off her credit card after every transaction. Is that weird?
news.summary: “I saw her transfer $150 after we were done shopping,” she says. “I’m like, ‘Oh my God, she’s transferring money.’”
